title: Successful login for each user role
description: Verify that buyers, sellers, affiliates, and admins can successfully authenticate using valid credentials with Supabase Auth and receive proper role-based access.

steps.description: Navigate to login page
Enter valid credentials for buyer role and submit
Verify authentication success and buyer dashboard access
Logout and repeat login with valid seller credentials
Verify authentication success and seller dashboard access
Logout and repeat login with valid affiliate credentials
Verify authentication success and affiliate dashboard access
Logout and repeat login with valid admin credentials
Verify authentication success and admin dashboard access

title: Login failure with invalid credentials
description: Verify that login attempts with invalid username or password fail gracefully with appropriate error messages.

steps.description: Navigate to login page
Enter incorrect username and/or password
Click login button
Verify login failure message is shown and no access granted

title: Product search and filtering accuracy
description: Verify that product search returns relevant products in real-time, filters by price and categories work correctly, and displayed results match filter criteria.

steps.description: Open marketplace homepage
Enter a search keyword for product names
Verify search results display products containing keyword
Apply price filter with min and max values
Verify displayed products all fall within price range
Apply category filter selecting multiple categories
Verify displayed products belong only to selected categories
Clear filters and search
Verify all products are displayed again with no filters

title: Real-time chat between buyer and seller
description: Verify real-time message exchange, offer creation, acceptance, and message read status updates in chat sessions between buyers and sellers.

steps.description: Buyer navigates to product detail and opens chat with seller
Buyer sends a message
Seller receives the message instantly with notification
Seller sends message reply
Buyer receives reply instantly
Buyer creates an offer specifying price and quantity
Seller receives offer and notification
Seller accepts the offer
Buyer receives acceptance message and offer status update
Chat read status updates are reflected correctly for both buyer and seller

title: Product CRUD operations with validations
description: Verify seller can add, edit, and delete products including required fields, image uploads, MOQ and commission settings; updates reflect instantly in listings.

steps.description: Seller navigates to Add Product page
Enter valid product details including images, MOQ, and commission
Submit the new product
Product is created and visible in seller's product list
Seller navigates to Edit Product page for existing product
Update product details and save
Product details update immediately in product listing
Seller deletes a product
Product is removed from product listing
Attempt product creation/edit with missing required fields
Validation errors are shown preventing submission
Attempt image upload with invalid format or exceeding size limits
Proper error messages are displayed and upload is rejected

title: Shopping cart validation and MOQ enforcement
description: Verify that buyer cart respects product MOQ rules, disables ordering below MOQ unless a negotiated offer exists, and updates cart totals accurately.

steps.description: Buyer adds product to cart with quantity below MOQ
Adding to cart is blocked with an appropriate notification
Buyer adds product to cart with quantity equal or above MOQ
Item is successfully added and cart updates accordingly
Buyer adds product with negotiated offer quantity below MOQ
Offer overrides MOQ restriction allowing product addition
Buyer reviews cart and verifies order payment summary
Order summary accurately reflects prices, quantities, and commissions

title: Order status transitions and OTP verification
description: Verify that OTP codes are generated, sent, verified correctly during shipping and delivery confirming order status transitions and triggering fund release.

steps.description: Seller marks order as shipped triggering OTP generation
OTP code is generated and sent to buyer
Buyer receives OTP and inputs it to confirm delivery
OTP is verified successfully and order status updates to delivered
Funds are released to seller based on verified OTP confirmation
Buyer attempts delivery confirmation with invalid OTP
OTP verification fails and order status does not change

title: Affiliate link generation and tracking
description: Verify that affiliates can generate unique tracking links, sessionStorage persists referral info, clicks and conversions are tracked accurately, and commissions reflect on affiliate dashboard.

steps.description: Affiliate generates a new referral link from dashboard
Unique link is created and displayed correctly
Simulate user clicking referral link adding referral info to sessionStorage
Referral tracking data is stored correctly and persists
Buyer completes purchase via referral link
Conversion is recorded and affiliate commission is updated accordingly
Affiliate views dashboard to verify click and conversion metrics
Metrics displayed match tracked referral data
Affiliate submits VIP partnership request
Request is received and confirmation shown

title: Dashboards display accurate metrics and allow withdrawal requests
description: Verify user role-specific dashboards show up-to-date sales, orders, commissions, and support commission withdrawal requests properly.

steps.description: Login as seller and open seller dashboard
Dashboard shows accurate product sales, order statuses, commissions earned
Initiate withdrawal request from seller dashboard
Request is processed and confirmation displayed
Login as affiliate and open affiliate dashboard
Display of link clicks, conversions, and commissions is accurate
Affiliate initiates commission withdrawal request
Withdrawal request is accepted and acknowledged

title: Buyer review submission and product rating update
description: Verify buyers can submit ratings and reviews after order delivery, reviews appear appropriately, and product rating averages update correctly.

steps.description: Buyer navigates to delivered order and submits rating and textual review
Review is saved and displayed on product detail page
Product average rating reflects newly added review
Attempt to submit review without rating or text where applicable
Validation prevents incomplete review submissions

title: Cross-role end-to-end commission allocation
description: Verify that commissions are correctly allocated and updated across buyer, seller, and affiliate flows from order negotiation through OTP delivery confirmation and payment release.

steps.description: Buyer negotiates product offer with seller via chat and accepts it, adding product to cart
Buyer completes order payment including affiliate referral tracking
Seller marks order shipped and OTP is generated, buyer confirms delivery with OTP
Seller commission is released after delivery OTP verification
Affiliate commission updates according to conversion from referral link
Dashboard metrics for seller and affiliate reflect completed transaction commissions

title: Session persistence and access control for authenticated users
description: Verify that authenticated sessions persist through navigation and refresh, and that access to pages and API endpoints is properly restricted by user role.

steps.description: Login as buyer and navigate through multiple pages
User session persists without requiring re-login
Refresh browser page
Session remains active and user stays logged in
Attempt to access seller-only pages with buyer credentials
Access is denied or redirected appropriately
Attempt API calls restricted to affiliate role with other roles
API returns 403 Forbidden or equivalent

title: Error handling when backend services are unavailable
description: Verify that the application gracefully handles Supabase service outages or failures during authentication, chat, product CRUD, and order operations with meaningful user feedback.

steps.description: Simulate Supabase Auth service outage during login
Application shows friendly error message and login is prevented
Simulate chat service unavailability during message send
User is notified message could not be delivered and retry option is available
Attempt product creation with product service down
Error message displayed and form remains for retry
Attempt order payment processing with backend service failure
User sees payment error and can retry or cancel

title: UI consistency and responsiveness across features
description: Verify that all user interfaces including login pages, product detail, chat, cart, dashboards, and review submission are consistent, accessible, and responsive on various screen sizes and devices.

steps.description: Open login, marketplace, chat, seller dashboard, and affiliate dashboard pages on desktop viewport
Verify all UI elements are properly aligned and functional without layout breaks
Repeat above navigation on tablet and mobile viewports
All pages adjust content appropriately and remain usable without horizontal scroll or overlaps
Perform accessibility checks such as keyboard navigation and screen reader usage
All interactive elements are reachable and labeled for accessibility compliance
